content.p: Caring to the End is a new research study by the Sue Ryder Care Centre, University of Nottingham. The study aims to explore the experiences of young people who have a parent in the last year of life. You are invited to take part in the study if you are: Find out more about the study and about what taking part involves. You can contact the researcher, Nicola Turner, who will be happy to answer any questions. email: ntxnt4@nottingham.ac.uk telephone: +44 (0)743 402 3847 The University of Nottingham Sue Ryder Care Centre for the Study of Supportive, Palliative and End of Life Care Queen's Medical Centre Nottingham, NG7 2HA telephone: +44 (0)743 402 3847 email: ntxnt4@nottingham.ac.uk
